cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MA, cs.RO, cs.SY. 

The paper proposes a novel approach to address the non-stationarity problem in multi-agent reinforcement learning, which is a common challenge in the field of machine learning. The paper focuses on deep reinforcement learning and adaptive policies, which are topics that are typically covered in the sub-categories of cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.MA (Multi-Agent Systems). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of policies to determine the best course of action in changing environments, which is a topic that is relevant to the sub-categories of cs.RO (Robotics) and cs.SY (Systems and Control). Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper are cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MA, cs.RO, and cs.SY, in that order.
